tool_description: Generates Online Certificate Status Protocol responses for certificate status queries, providing real-time revocation information with cryptographic signatures.

certificate_serial.description: Serial number of certificate being queried

issuer_name_hash.description: Hash of the certificate issuer's name

issuer_key_hash.description: Hash of the certificate issuer's public key

hash_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm used: SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, SHA512

response_validity_hours.description: OCSP response validity period in hours (1-168)

nonce.description: OCSP request nonce for replay protection

error_messages: Certificate not found: Serial number does not match any issued certificate.
Invalid issuer hash: Issuer name or key hash does not match CA certificate.
Unsupported hash algorithm: Use SHA1, SHA256, SHA384, or SHA512.
Invalid validity period: Response validity must be between 1-168 hours.
OCSP signing key unavailable: OCSP responder signing key is not available.
Signature generation failed: Unable to generate OCSP response signature.
usage: Provide certificate_serial, issuer_name_hash, and issuer_key_hash. Optionally specify hash_algorithm, response_validity_hours, and nonce. Tool generates signed OCSP response.

certificate_status.description: Certificate status: GOOD, REVOKED, or UNKNOWN
